text.text_translated:
Carol Dweck is a psychologist.  
She studies how people think.  
She talks about brain plasticity.  
Plasticity means the brain can change.  
She also talks about a growth mindset.  
A growth mindset means you can get better by trying.  
Many people only praise the final  result.  
They say “You have a good eye for details.”  
They also say “You are good at arranging events.”  
Research shows that praising effort helps skills grow.  
Research also shows that praising experimentation helps skills grow.  
Research also shows that praising solving problems helps skills grow.
